querystring.select: SELECT ACEC.CONTACT_PERSON_NAME AS ContactPersonName, RMG.DESCR AS MrGenderDescr, RMIT.DESCR AS MrIdTypeDescr, ACEC.BIRTH_PLACE as BirthPlace, ACEC.ID_NO AS IdNo, ACEC.BIRTH_DT AS BirthDt, ACEC.ID_EXPIRED_DT as IdExipedDt, RMCR.DESCR as MrCustRelationshipDescr, ACEC.MOBILE_PHN_NO_1 as MobilePhone1, ACEC.MOBILE_PHN_NO_2 as MobilePhone2, ACEC.EMAIL as Email, ACEC.ADDR + ' ' + ACEC.AREA_CODE_3 + ' ' + ACEC.AREA_CODE_4 + ' ' + ACEC.AREA_CODE_1 + ' ' + ACEC.AREA_CODE_2 + ' ' + ACEC.CITY + ' ' + ACEC.ZIPCODE AS Addr, ACEC.PHN_AREA_1+' '+ACEC.PHN_1+'-'+ACEC.PHN_EXT_1 AS Phone1, ACEC.PHN_AREA_2+' '+ACEC.PHN_2+'-'+ACEC.PHN_EXT_2 AS Phone2, ACEC.PHN_AREA_3+' '+ACEC.PHN_3+'-'+ACEC.PHN_EXT_3 AS Phone3
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_EMRGNC_CNTCT ACEC WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_CUST_ID=ACEC.APP_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMG WITH (NOLOCK) ON ACEC.MR_GENDER_CODE = RMG.MASTER_CODE AND RMG.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='GENDER' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMIT WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON AC.MR_ID_TYPE_CODE = RMIT.MASTER_CODE AND RMIT.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'ID_TYPE' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMCR WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ACEC.MR_CUST_RELATIONSHIP_CODE = RMCR.MASTER_CODE AND RMCR.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE IN ('CUST_PERSONAL_RELATIONSHIP','CUST_COMPANY_RELATIONSHIP')
